reviewText:
As some one said. these films are like watching Playboy shoots, except for one thing,  I have never seen a playboy shoot where a woman is stabbed endlessly in her most private area, or another is tied to the front of a VW beetle has jump leads clamped to her nipples and electrocuted, or where a girl is chased naked through a corn field by a combine harvester, or where another has a broom handle inserted into her A-hole and used as a floor mop, or how about where another is made to paint the office wall using her ample breasts as paint brushes. And thats just the tip of the iceberg. All the girls are sexy as hell, have cute East European accents AND there is hardly a tattoo in site (No tattoos in the first three films at all. A nice change from most sexplotation films these days).

Add great original music and excellent lighting and I think you'll agree that there is nothing to touch the Fantom Kiler series, as many people have found. If you don't believe me just google Teraz Films and find out for yourself.
